description.ruby-sapphire:
An extremely speedy and
unavoidable attack.
description.emerald:
An extremely speedy and
unavoidable attack.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An extremely fast
attack against one
target. It can’t be
evaded.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user confounds
the foe with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands
without fail.
description.platinum:
The user confounds
the foe with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands
without fail.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user confounds
the foe with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands
without fail.
description.black-white:
The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.
description.x-y:
The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
This attack never misses.

The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
This attack never misses.
description.sun-moon:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
